mapper.sql: A.id as A_id,A.trade_no as A_trade_no,A.channel_no as A_channel_no,A.agent_no as A_agent_no, A.agent_level as A_agent_level,A.merchant_no as A_merchant_no,A.qr_code as A_qr_code,A.pay_code as A_pay_code, A.type as A_type,A.rate_type as A_rate_type,ifnull(A.amount,0) as A_amount,A.merchant_rate as A_merchant_rate,A.fixed_amount as A_fixed_amount, ifnull(A.merchant_cost,0) as A_merchant_cost,A.status as A_status,A.create_time as A_create_time,A.remark as A_remark, A.temp_1 as A_temp_1,A.temp_2 as A_temp_2
mapper.select:
select
from t_merchant_cost A
order by
${orderBy}
mapper.insert: insert into t_merchant_cost ( id, trade_no, channel_no, agent_no, agent_level, merchant_no, qr_code, pay_code, type, rate_type, amount, merchant_rate, fixed_amount, merchant_cost, status, create_time, remark, temp_1, temp_2 ) values (UUID(), #{tradeNo}, #{channelNo}, #{agentNo}, #{agentLevel}, #{merchantNo}, #{qrCode}, #{payCode}, #{type}, #{rateType}, #{amount}, #{merchantRate}, #{fixedAmount}, #{merchantCost}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{remark}, #{temp1}, #{temp2} )
mapper.update:
update t_merchant_cost A
A.id = #{record.id},
A.trade_no = #{record.tradeNo},
A.channel_no = #{record.channelNo},
A.agent_no = #{record.agentNo},
A.agent_level = #{record.agentLevel},
A.merchant_no = #{record.merchantNo},
A.qr_code = #{record.qrCode},
A.pay_code = #{record.payCode},
A.type = #{record.type},
A.rate_type = #{record.rate_type},
A.amount = #{record.amount},
A.merchant_rate = #{record.merchantRate},
A.fixed_amount = #{record.fixedAmount},
A.merchant_cost = #{record.merchantCost},
A.status = #{record.status},
A.create_time = #{record.createTime},
A.remark = #{record.remark},
A.temp_1 = #{record.temp1},
A.temp_2 = #{record.temp2},

update t_merchant_cost A
A.id = #{id},
A.trade_no = #{tradeNo},
A.channel_no = #{channelNo},
A.agent_no = #{agentNo},
A.agent_level = #{agentLevel},
A.merchant_no = #{merchantNo},
A.qr_code = #{qrCode},
A.pay_code = #{payCode},
A.type = #{type},
A.rate_type = #{rateType},
A.amount = #{amount},
A.merchant_rate = #{merchantRate},
A.fixed_amount = #{fixedAmount},
A.merchant_cost = #{merchantCost},
A.status = #{status},
A.create_time = #{createTime},
A.remark = #{remark},
A.temp_1 = #{temp1},
A.temp_2 = #{temp2},
where A.id = #{id}
